articles.author: Richard Connor, Alex Berry
articles.title: Germany, Europe mark 80 years since end of World War II - DW
articles.description: European countries, including Germany, are commemorating the end of World War II on the continent. Europe's deadliest war came to an end 80 years ago. DW has the latest.
articles.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin welcomed Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping to the Kremlin Thursday ahead of Friday's massive military parade celebrating the end of World War II, which Russia celebrates… [+1253 chars]
